official_title: A concurrent resolution concerning appropriate notification of hospital closings.

summary.text: Declares that, not less than 60 days before the termination of any service or the closure of any facility, a hospital should notify the community it serves, its employees, government agencies, and health care organizations of such termination or closure.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution concerning appropriate notification of hospital closings.
